channel.title: [PI] Offical Acheron V3 Release
channel.description:
WELCOME *Please note i named the last official Acheron , Anarchy so you dont get confused* V1 Release: https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=642681.0 V2 : https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,653706.0.html Credits Me [Brian] - 20% Maxime - 20% / Thanks for everything bro Haden - 10% / Thanks for giving me ideas broski Hack3r - 5%/Need torva , bandos etc ints thanks ikeptadvertisingnowitscenscored - 5%/Just because maxime gave you credits on v1 Sanity - 35%/ thank you for making Pi DeathlyHallows - 2.5% Thanks for Armadyl Ints Zyro - 2.5%/ Thanks for the gameframe lol
Features - Dicing - Pm logs - Chat logs - Commands logs - Vote store - Curse prayer - Players shop - Donator island - All Tzhaar waves - Custom quest tab - Bank slots fixed - Vote4Cash system - Money pouch fixed - 317 Gameframe fixed - Multiple custom item - Custom ranks + crowns - Clan chat + Lootshare - Donator Credits system - Ingame item spawner GUI - Staff interface options - Created summoning system - Perfect skillcape emotes - All 25 skill work perfectly - Perfect combat + perfect PVP - Dungeoneering & Pk'ing skills - Skillcape shop with no more lag - Quest cape require all stats 99 - Christmas craker system opening - Loyalty titles system color fixed - Donator cape gives 1.5x more experiences - Removed Fullscreen - Removed Nex [With Stages] - Frost Dragons - Removed More Skin Colors - Aurora's or how ever you spell it - Loyalty Shop & Rank - REMOVED GRAND EXCHNAGE BECAUSE I DIDNT LIKE IT
Ranks + Crowns 1- Moderator 2- Administrator 3- Co-Owner 4- Donator 5- Sponsor 6- Owner 7- V.I.P 8- Trusted 9- Veteran
Minigames - Barrows - Duel arena - Tzhaar cave - Pest control - Warriors guild
Bosses - Godwars - Corporal beast - Dagannoth kings - Tormented demons - King black dragon - Kalphite Queen - Nomad - Penguin - Tormented Demon - Mad Mummy - Forgotten Warrior - ETC
Media *Sorry they may be shitty because i was rushing. [img]http://imageshack.us/a/img33/3234/wpp2.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.us/a/img62/5409/vwd0.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.us/a/img543/7499/puty.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.us/a/img812/6011/my6a.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.us/a/img716/7734/4g7f.png[/img]
